articles.title: Lakers shrug at playoff seedings, don't feel like 'underdogs' - ESPN India
articles.description: Lakers stars LeBron James and Anthony Davis expressed no concern over being the No. 7 seed in the NBA playoffs, with Davis saying, "We don't look at ourselves as underdogs."
